title: House of Terror aka The Blind Villain
description: First Edition. Ex Library Book. Library stamp on title page. Some edge & shelf wear. Plastic protective cover to DJ. Original Price of $2.95 is intact. Foxing to pages and edges. About the first 17 pages off binding at bottom 1/3 - top 2/3 intact. Original dust jacket with light colored tape applied to perimeter as reinforcement and as such brown color and/or outline appears on front side of DJ.
author: Evelyn Berckman
